title: Hextech Key + Chest
body:
Liking the sound of that riot :)

having a chance to win skin rentals/permanent skins/permanent champions sounds nice

replies.body: Yeah, gives a new feel to winning, other than just IP and LP (if ranked). It gives a new purpose to why someone really wants to win. it could even bring down the troll rate, as lots of people will like the sound of getting cool rewards.

What worries me is that i read that it's tied to your end game ranking, so i feel that some players will abuse this by queuing up with say a level 20 for example and stomping to get whatever goes towards getting said chest/key. unless it works a different way and i just misread i think there's gonna be a few issues with it, but i agree it is a nice addition and i'm definitely not complaining.

Yes, people could get rewards cheaply, but that's only the keys. Unlocking the Hextech Chests depends on your post-game stats, like what grade you got on that champ (S+, S-, A, etc). This is a good way to counter-act the cheap rewards problem, hopefully...
